entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload - Provide a way to suppress rude edit dialog #21412
  • Enable implicit RID with `--sc` #21405
  • How to test .NET on macOS Arm64 #21404
  • Cannot get a .NET Core 3.1 app to run on .NET 6 with `dotnet run` on macos-arm64 #21401

Closed

  • High CPU usage from dotnet CLI with 6.0-RC1 builds #21028

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1386001 #21411
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1385830 #21407
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1385782 #21406
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1385519 #21400
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add rollback option to install command and allow missing manifest ids #21283
    Area-Workloads
